testCase.requirementText: Content division mets/structMap[@LABEL='CSIP']/div/div[@LABEL='Representations'] When no representations are present the content referenced in the file section file group with @USE attribute value “Representations” is described in the structural map as a single sub division.
testCase.description: A warning is thrown if there is no div-element with the @LABEL='Representations' nested in the div-element with the @LABEL='CSIP', and an error is thrown if there are more than one div-element with the @LABEL='Representations' nested in the div-element with the @LABEL='CSIP'. Identical with CSIP103
